Functions

Function(s) admin.tables_is_empty.
Check if the passed tables have any content. With show_size=true, return the table size too. (Computing the table sizes is somewhat resource consuming. Example: select * from admin.tables_is_empty(true, ARRAY['FinanceController2PaymentDefDO', 'FinanceController2TaxTypeDefDO', 'FinanceControllerDO', 'Import_Dispatch', 'Import_Order']);

FUNCTION admin.tables_is_empty ( show_size boolean, tablenames text[], OUT schemaname text, OUT tablename text, OUT empty boolean, OUT total_relation_size text ) RETURNS setof record LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' volatile;
